item.title: 4 weeks to fitness experiment
item.description:
A healthy programmer, is an effective programmer.
- me (when deciding to write this post)

One of my key goals for this year is to get in to the habit of keeping myself healthy. I believe its in our best interest as software engineers to have a balanced lifestlye to ensure â€¦
